app.rdg: To the tune “Joys of Day and Night”

I remember the day we first met in the bedroom
The term for bedroom specifically refers to a bedroom for newly-weds. It is unclear whether the couple are themselves newly-weds or if this term is being used symbolically. The mention of “secret joy” in the third line implies that they may be unmarried lovers..
It seemed that we would be together forever.
How could I have known that an encounter of secret joy
would end in the pain and sorrow of parting?
Not to mention that it happened when spring's beauty, declining, came to its end.
Facing a full sight of disarrayed flowers and whirling catkins,
I worried that the good times
would all go away with him.
A plight of loneliness— whom should I tell?
The words of the past are always easy to discard.
Had I only realized how hard (it would be to live without him)!
I regret that I did not make him stay.
What can I do, since he is not only charming and well-mannered
but also has many other good traits that tie one’s heart?
Even when I am not thinking about him for one day,

my eyebrows frown
A common idiom which means that one is worried. a thousand times.
